name: Perception (itch) (Luu Argonaut)
description:
Created for Game Jam "FMICodes: Code for Art" hosted in Sofia, Bulgaria. 

Winner, 1st place!

Perception is a game where you paint the world in order to find the right path to the finish.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

1 - Enable White Paint

2 - Enable Green Paint (Heal Secret Trees)

3 - Enable Pink Paint (Jumping Higher)
